DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this pilot project is to see if a supplemental form of dietary gangliosides can serve as a potential treatment for the rare metabolic condition called ganglioside GM3 synthase deficiency.
DOC.brief_title: Oral Supplementation of Gangliosides to Treat a Rare Metabolic Disorder
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of GM3 synthase deficiency
